輬字的基本解释

輬
liáng
见“辌”。

輬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liáng］
［《廣韻》吕張切，平陽，來。］
“辌1”的繁体字。
(1)古代的卧车。
(2)后亦作丧车。参见“輬車”。

輬字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輬； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1245第23
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】呂張切【正韻】龍張切，?音凉。【說文】臥車也。【韻會】師古曰：轀輬，本安車以臥息，後因載喪，飾以柳翣，遂爲喪車。轀者密閉，輬者旁開，各別一乗，隨事爲名。後人專以載喪，又去其一，總爲籓飾，合二名而呼之。孟康曰：如衣車有窗牖，閉之則轀，開之則輬。

輬字的源字形

字源演变：

暂无。

[①]［liáng］
["Guangyun" Lv Zhangqie, Binh Duong, come. ]
Traditional characters for "辌1".
(1) The ancient sleeping car.
(2) The latter is also used as a funeral. See "Cart".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　輬; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1245 Page 23
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Lu Zhangqie [Zheng Yun] Long Zhangqie,? The sound is cool. [Said the text] Sleeping car too. [Rhyme Club] Shigu said: Yili, the intrinsically safe car lie down, and later because of the funeral, decorated with Liu Xie, then it is a funeral car. The stalker is airtight, and the stalker is opened next to each other. Later generations dedicated to carrying mourning, and then went to the first, always decorated as a 籓, called by the two names together. Meng Kang said: If a sewing machine has a window, it will be closed when it is closed, and it will be closed when it is opened.
